title: Logan Paul warns friends to stay away from Justin Bieber at KSI rematch
text:
Logan Paul has warned his friends and family to stay away from Justin Bieber at the KSI rematch.

The YouTube star, who’s been in intense training mode as the highly-anticipated fight nears, spoke out about the big names that will be rocking up to the event.

‘We’re trying to get as [many] as our influencer friends into the fight as possible but apparently there’s like a ticket situation,’ he explained on his podcast Impaulsive.

‘There’s going to be some big celebrities coming, I think Bieber is coming. I’m gonna place him next to my mother and father.’

The pair are facing each other in the ring on 9 November (Picture: Getty Images)

He went on to warn his pals: ‘And by the way, if anyone in my family and friends section asks Bieber for a picture, I am kicking you the f*** out. Just leave the kid alone.

Advertisement

Advertisement

‘I just want to promise him sanctity and safety and entertainment.’

The Sorry hitmaker has made it clear he’s backing Logan, after he urged the YouTuber to ‘rip KSI’s head off’, before KSI hit back at the star, simply telling him ‘F*** you, Justin.’

Well, alrighty then.

Meanwhile, although Logan didn’t mention any of the other big names in attendance, he later name-dropped Brooklyn Beckham, claiming he was planning on taking him as a plus one to a party.

Justin’s thrown his support behind Logan (Picture: GC Images)

Saying that his best friend Mike Majlak wasn’t invited to Dan Bilzerian’s Halloween party, Logan said: ‘I asked him to bring my friend Brooklyn Beckham, David Beckham’s son, and then he specifically – Dan – went out of his way to say, “Yeah, just not that Mike guy.'”‘

Subtle.

Brooklyn could also be set to make an appearance (Picture: Getty Images)

The connection might come as a surprise to fans, since the pair haven’t been seen hanging out, but it could mean that Brooklyn is another of the big guests set to appear at the fight.

It’s all go for Logan right now, especially after he suffered a gruesome injury to the mouth during his training.

The YouTuber took to Instagram to share a pretty unsightly video, explaining: ‘I got a little piece of my gum torn off today.’

Advertisement

Advertisement

Zooming in for all to see, he added: ‘You see that? Right there. And then I swallowed it, chewed it up, and used it as protein.’

Lovely.

description: Logan Paul confirms Justin Bieber will be at KSI rematch as he boasts about 'big celebrities' and Brooklyn Beckham.
